bug.author: qianyizh
bug.summary: Travis CI build broken because of time out
bug.description:
<denchmark-link:https://travis-ci.org/IntelVCL/Open3D/jobs/428366682>https://travis-ci.org/IntelVCL/Open3D/jobs/428366682</denchmark-link>
Screenshots <denchmark-code>No output has been received in the last 10m0s, this potentially indicates a stalled build or something wrong with the build itself. Check the details on how to adjust your build configuration on: https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/common-build-problems/#Build-times-out-because-no-output-was-received The build has been terminated </denchmark-code>
Solution should be this: <denchmark-link:https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/common-build-problems/>https://docs.travis-ci.com/user/common-build-problems/</denchmark-link>
